SELECT cf.course_favorite_id, cf.course_id, cf.user_id, cf.deleted, cf.created_time, cf.updated_time FROM course_favorite AS cf
cf.deleted = 0
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM course c WHERE c.course_id = cf.course_id AND c.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%') )
ORDER BY cf.updated_time DESC

SELECT cr.course_id, cr.course_img_url, cr.course_name, cr.course_description, crf.updated_time FROM course AS cr INNER JOIN course_favorite AS crf ON cr.course_id = crf.course_id WHERE crf.user_id = #{userId}
